reasoning: Reporting incidence (new diagnoses) in children aged 0-19. Pediatric lymphomas (Hodgkin + Non-Hodgkin) incidence approximately 1.8 per 100k children globally based on SEER and international cancer registry data from mid-2000s.
source: Linabery AM, Ross JA (2008). Childhood and adolescent cancer survival in the US by race and ethnicity for the diagnostic period 1975-1999. Cancer. 113(9):2575-96
